# Electric Vengeance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Electricity Spells|electricity]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM: [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]**

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 5 ft.

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 111

*As the creature strikes you, an arc of lightning springs from your body and blasts the creature in return.*

You can cast this spell only when another creature has just dealt hit point damage to you with a melee attack. When you cast *electric vengeance,* a blast of lightning arcs from your body into the subjectâ€™s; the arc deals 2d8 points of electricity damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +10).
